channel.title: A few problems
channel.description:
Hi.. I'm having a few problems with my 508 Server.
- I need to Add Drops to NPC's (Currently Looking for a Tutorial) - Banking - It seems the Banking area of the server has completely messed up.. - You can't withdraw Notes - Store - X doesn't work. - Store - 0 (Related to Store X) doesn't work.
Will update if I find further problems. If anyone can Help with any one of these problems, please send me a PM or post a reply. Thanks.

item.title: A few problems
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

Hmm I used to own a few 317 servers… But got bored of them.
So I decided to create a new project (508 server) and so far It’s pretty much perfect except for those problems… - P.S. I found a few shops that work but… can’t find where to edit the shop. I’ll keep looking and thanks for the replys.

Read full topic

item.title: A few problems
item.dc:creator: @mad_moparscapian mad_moparscapian
item.description:
@mad_moparscapian wrote:

[quote=“Kayceee, post:1, topic:273318”]Hi… I’m having a few problems with my 508 Server.

  • I need to Add Drops to NPC’s (Currently Looking for a Tutorial)
  • Banking - It seems the Banking area of the server has completely messed up…
  • You can’t withdraw Notes
  • Store - X doesn’t work.
  • Store - 0 (Related to Store X) doesn’t work.

Will update if I find further problems.
If anyone can Help with any one of these problems, please send me a PM or post a reply. Thanks.[/quote]

On 508’s noted items is completly f**ked up, if you would like a server that is 98% bug free i would suggest using a 317
